alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 17 at 3:24AM HST until December 18 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF WARNING CANCELLED FOR ALL SHORES... .A north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will continue to produce large surf today. However, wave period and height will gradually diminish through tonight, reducing the threat for significant shoreline impacts. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SUNDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Surf 18 to 24 feet along north facing shores, and 12 to 18 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out. Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts.
